title: Why Is This Man Running for President? (Update)
description: A year ago, nobody was taking Andrew Yang very seriously. Now he is America’s favorite entrepre-nerd, with a candidacy that keeps gaining momentum. This episode includes our Jan. 2019 conversation with the leader of the Yang Gang and a fresh interview recorded from the campaign trail in Iowa.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
